The Oblitercons/Manterror/Injector/Double Punch/Bumblebee/Nemesis Enforcer



Dark One looked to Zardus.  "Yes, I would like my payment immediately.  Then 
we will renegotiate our contract as was dictated prior to our official 
servitude to you." Dark One said, the Oblitercons taking a step forward.

===

Manterror and Injector got out of their CR chambers in time for Bumblee, a 
few missiles from the jet fighters having blew his left side wide open and 
charred his face, put Double Punch in a CR chamber, climbing into one himself.

Injector looked to Manterror.  "Guess they couldn't do jack without us."

"Got that right!" Manterror laughed.  Both headed to the bridge.

Injector looked around, spotting Hell Beast.  "Hey!  Bossman, we need 
something to do.  We've got a lot of energy and we missed the slaggin' fight! 
 How 'bout we go shoot up the Maxis or something?"

"Yeah!  Last time we were there just the three of us kicked around a dozen of 
'em."

===

Nemesis Enforcer looked to Zardus, "coughing".  -Why in the Pit was I called 
up here?- he asked himself, via inner monologue.
